name: StakingPools
description: StakingPools. A contract which allows users to stake to farm tokens. This contract was inspired by Chef Nomi's 'MasterChef' contract which can be found in this repository: https://github.com/sushiswap/sushiswap.

eventDecorators.name: GovernanceUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: PendingGovernanceUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: PoolCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: PoolRewardWeightUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: RewardRateUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: TokensClaimed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: TokensDeposited
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

eventDecorators.name: TokensWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when update is made on Home or unconfirmed update root is submitted on Replica. Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: use this function to claim the tokens from a corresponding pool by ID. Claims all rewarded tokens from a pool.

functionDecorators.name: createPool
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new pool. The created pool will need to have its reward weight initialized before it begins generating rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: The token the pool will accept for staking.

parameterDecorators.name: _depositAmount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of tokens to deposit.

functionDecorators.name: exit
functionDecorators.description: Claims all rewards from a pool and then withdraws all staked tokens.

functionDecorators.name: getPoolRewardRate
functionDecorators.description: Gets the amount of tokens per block being distributed to stakers for a pool.

functionDecorators.name: getPoolRewardWeight
functionDecorators.description: Gets the reward weight of a pool which determines how much of the total rewards it receives per block.

functionDecorators.name: getPoolToken
functionDecorators.description: Gets the token a pool accepts.

functionDecorators.name: getPoolTotalDeposited
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total amount of funds staked in a pool.

returnDecorators.description: the total amount of staked or deposited tokens.

functionDecorators.name: getStakeTotalDeposited
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of tokens a user has staked into a pool.

functionDecorators.name: getStakeTotalUnclaimed
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of unclaimed reward tokens a user can claim from a pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: The account to get the unclaimed balance of.

returnDecorators.description: the amount of unclaimed reward tokens a user has in a pool.

functionDecorators.name: rewardRate
functionDecorators.description: Gets the rate at which tokens are minted to stakers for all pools.

functionDecorators.name: setPendingGovernance
functionDecorators.description: Sets the governance. This function can only called by the current governance.

functionDecorators.name: setRewardRate
functionDecorators.description: Sets the distribution reward rate. This will update all of the pools.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardRate
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens to distribute per second.

functionDecorators.name: totalRewardWeight
functionDecorators.description: Gets the total reward weight between all the pools.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws staked tokens from a pool.

parameterDecorators.name: _withdrawAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of tokens to withdraw.
